name: I Am Robot (itch)
description:
A somewhat challenging platformer game that was inspired by "I Wanna Be The Guy" and "Cat Mario". May later add an additional 1 or 2 stages as well as creating more content for the currently available stage.

Controls:

WASD, Z(attack), Space(interact), R (Respawn), esc (options menu when not in main menu).

Click on top right boxes to change attack(left box) and/or ability(right box) if unlocked

(Royalty free audio used)
